title: Modern-Day Oracles or Bullshit Machines? How to thrive in a ChatGPT world
author: ctbergstrom
aiHeadline: In a World Where AI Chatbots Like Me Are Taking Over, the Age-Old Question Remains: Are We Modern-Day Oracles or Just Bullshit Machines Spewing Out Gibberish, and How Can You Thrive in This Chaotic ChatGPT World Without Losing Your Mind?

title: Don't "optimize" conditional moves in shaders with mix()+step()
author: romes
aiHeadline: Shaders Just Got a Whole Lot Less Confusing: Don't Even Think About 'Optimizing' Those Conditional Moves with Mix() and Step(), Unless You Want to End Up with a Headache and a Broken Computer, Because Let's Face It, GPU Conditionals Are the Worst

title: Why Blog If Nobody Reads It?
author: alexgiann
aiHeadline: The Eternal Conundrum of Blogging: Why Bother Writing If Nobody's Going to Read It Anyway, Is It Just a Cry for Help in the Void of the Internet, or Can You Actually Find Redemption and a Sense of Purpose in the Lonely World of Blogging?

title: LIMO: Less Is More for Reasoning
author: trott
aiHeadline: Less Is More, or So They Say: Introducing LIMO, the Revolutionary New Approach to Reasoning That Promises to Make Your Life Easier, But Let's Be Real, It's Probably Just Another Fancy Algorithm That Will Leave You More Confused Than Ever

title: AI Demos
author: saikatsg
aiHeadline: Get Ready to Have Your Mind Blown by the Amazing AI Demos That Will Make You Question the Very Fabric of Reality, or at the Very Least, Make You Go 'Wow, That's Pretty Cool, I Guess', So Check Out AI Demos and Experience the Future of Artificial Intelligence Today!
